title: Libra and Capricorn Compatibility: Love, Sex, and More

steps.title: These two signs are natural opposites, which can create a mutual attraction.
steps.content: These two signs are natural opposites, which can create a mutual attraction. Libra is an air sign, meaning they're a social butterfly who loves talking about their emotions. On the flip side, Capricorn is a logical and stoic sign who sticks to a small circle of friends. Their traits complement each other nicely, and the pair might just find that they balance out each other’s lives well. These two signs match each other’s intensity when it comes to a relationship. Neither sign is really set up for anything casual—when they meet someone they like, they want to pursue things to the fullest extent. Libras are attracted to intellect, which is great for the naturally intelligent Capricorn. [1] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Libra and Capricorn make a “square aspect,” which means that their signs are exactly 90 degrees apart in the zodiac wheel. Love astrology? Take this quiz to discover your soulmate’s sign.

steps.title: Each sign has opposing views on sex, which can lead to some awkwardness.
steps.content: Each sign has opposing views on sex, which can lead to some awkwardness. In the bedroom, these two aren’t quite matched up—Libra loves to be romantic and “make love,” while Capricorn would rather save the fancy stuff for special occasions. Both signs need to communicate their needs and talk to each other about what they want. [2] X Research source Capricorns tend to see sex as a stress-reliever, while Libra views sex as a way to grow closer together. In general, Capricorns aren’t very romantic signs. They don’t love the mushy side of sex—even when they’re in love, they’re very practical. [3] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021.

steps.title: Libra may have to teach Capricorn how to open up.
steps.content: Libra may have to teach Capricorn how to open up. Libra is the sign of partnerships, meaning they’re no stranger to leading the emotional side of things in a relationship. [4] X Research source On the flip side, the more reserved Capricorn isn’t used to sharing their feelings, and they may need some time to get closer to their partner. [5] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. The Libra in this pairing might find themselves asking the Capricorn prodding questions about their feelings. “How did that make you feel?” “Are you feeling upset?” and “Can you explain why you did that?” are common questions that may arise in their relationship.

steps.title: Both signs are very goal-oriented, which makes for a great match.
steps.content: Both signs are very goal-oriented, which makes for a great match. Capricorn is ruled by Saturn, the planet of hard work and determination. Libra is ruled by Venus, which values deep commitment and partnership. You’ll never see a Libra-Capricorn couple that isn’t thinking about the big picture. They will lift each other up and strive toward their shared goals together. [6] X Research source Capricorns in particular need someone who will push them to achieve their goals. [7] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. If the Libra can’t do that for them, they may move on to someone else. If the two can work through their differences and focus on this aspect of their relationship, they have the potential to be a very powerful couple.

steps.title: Both signs can be a little stubborn, which can make communication difficult.
steps.content: Both signs can be a little stubborn, which can make communication difficult. Capricorn is very set in their ways, while Libra is very passionate about the things that are important to them. Partners in this relationship need to remember to compromise with each other and put the relationship first—otherwise, they might come to a stalemate. [8] X Research source Air signs and earth signs sometimes have trouble understanding where the other is coming from because these elements are exact opposites. Air signs are more emotional, whereas earth signs are more grounded and logical.

steps.title: Capricorn can be blunt, while Libra is a little more diplomatic.
steps.content: Capricorn can be blunt, while Libra is a little more diplomatic. These two signs can clash over the way they say things, even if they’re talking about the same thing. Capricorn likes to be straightforward and honest, while Libra will give you a harsh truth while still being kind. [9] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 23 December 2021. Both signs value honesty, but Libra might get their feelings hurt by Capricorn’s communication style. Each sign needs to work toward understanding the other’s way of talking. The Cap may need to soften their words a bit, while the Libra might need to learn to speak their mind more.

steps.title: This relationship can work, as long as the pair accepts their differences.
steps.content: This relationship can work, as long as the pair accepts their differences. Libras value emotion, while Capricorn is more logical. In order for this pairing to work, Libra really needs to give Capricorn the time to open up. Similarly, Capricorn needs to work hard at expressing their emotions and valuing what Libra says to them. If they can connect on an emotional level, this pairing will be set up for success. Capricorn can also be fairly judgemental, which can scare the more sensitive Libra. Accepting each other, flaws and all, will help this relationship blossom.
